column4: hi, i am a fedora user i plan to trial ubuntu now. i am a kde user and i use samba/vnc/httpd extensively in my home network. should I download ubuntu or kubuntu and desktop or server edition??
I would also like to check out the new gnome desktop
if your sold on kde then kubuntu would be appropriate.  you can use the same /home folder if you like so you dont lose anything
sorry didn't see that you can try both out by going with either cd and doing sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop or sudo apt-get install kubuntu-desktop
